moduleDescription: Exposes app components and modifies intent filters to enable deeper integration between apps

settings.title: Target Applications
settings.summary: Select which apps to expose components from

settings.title: Log Component Access
settings.summary: Keep a log of all component access through DeepIntegrator

settings.title: Auto-Expose Components
settings.summary: Automatically expose all components from target apps

settings.title: Bypass Component Permission Checks
settings.summary: Allow accessing components that require permissions

settings.title: Component Configuration
settings.summary: Configure which components to expose and how to modify intent filters
settings.description: Each component can be configured with exported status and custom intent filters

settings.title: Component Access Logs
settings.summary: View logs of component access through DeepIntegrator
